bibl.seg: VAN MINNEN Peter, Greek Papyri and Coptic Studies, 1996-2000.

Mat IMMERZEEL and Jacques VAN DER VLIET (Edd.), with the assistance of Maarten KERSTEN and Carolien VAN ZOEST, Coptic Studies on the Treshold of a New Millennium. Proceedings of the Seventh International Congress of Coptic Studies. Leiden, 27 August - 2 September 2000. I = Orientalia Lovaniensia Analecta. 133 (Leuven, 2004) pp. 423-445.

[Introduction.] - Electronic developments. - General interest in Egypt in late antiquity. - Texts new and old. - New editions. - General, political history. - Administration and taxation. - Military. - Economy. - Society. - Religion. - Law. - Literature, culture, sciences. - Language and lexicography. - Geography and onomastics.
